thread.section_title: L'Edmond Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good hotel with excellent staff!
thread.title_full: Good hotel with excellent staff! - Review of L'Edmond Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: DoctorCPR
title: Good hotel with excellent staff!
text:
We got the two storey room. It was still not a lot of space to move about but we are a couple with a 5 year old so this met our requirements. The microwave, small fridge, cooktop and utensils were useful.
The hotel is located close to a metro station (De Villiers) about 200m away. There is plenty of shops around. Nearby is a market where you can buy grocery, baked food, vegetables and fruits.
The staff were excellent - all of them! The had answers to all your questions and concerns. Very friendly too.
I have to specifically mention Jules - on our last day, on check out it was raining and we had our luggages and with the kid have to get to the metro station. It was certainly a problem going with the luggage in the rain but the place is too close to order a taxi. Jules took the trouble of coming with us and some umbrellas from the hotel to the metro station. This was very helpful and we really appreciate that!
Room Tip: We got the two storey rooms which was really good (room 103) See more room tips
